pli-tv-pvr1.9:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.9:0.4: The section on where it was laid down
pli-tv-pvr1.9:0.5: 1. The chapter on offenses entailing expulsion
pli-tv-pvr1.9:1.1: “The first offense entailing expulsion, for having sexual intercourse, was laid down by the Buddha who knows and sees, the Perfected One, the fully Awakened One. Where was it laid down? Whom is it about? What is it about? …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.1: “The first offense entailing expulsion, for having sexual intercourse, that was laid down by the Buddha who knows and sees, the Perfected One, the fully Awakened One—where was it laid down?”
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.6: How Sudinna had sexual intercourse with his former wife.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.7: “Is there a rule, an addition to the rule, an unprompted rule?”
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.8: There is one rule. There are two additions to the rule.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.10: “Is it a rule that applies everywhere, or that applies in a particular place?”
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.12: “Is it a rule that the monks and nuns have in common, or a rule they do not have in common?”
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.13: That the monks and nuns have in common.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.14: “Is it a rule for one Sangha or for both Sanghas?”
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.16: “In which of the five ways of reciting the Monastic Code is it immersed and included?”
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.20: “What kind of failure is it among the four kinds of failure?”
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.25: He originates it by one origin—
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.26: he originates it by body and by mind, not by speech …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.27: By whom has it been conveyed?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:2.28: It has been conveyed by a succession (of teachers):
pli-tv-pvr1.9:3.2: as well as Soṇaka, similarly Siggava,
pli-tv-pvr1.9:3.4: these in the glorious (is)land of Jambusiri—
pli-tv-pvr1.9:5.1: These sinless sages of great wisdom,
pli-tv-pvr1.9:5.2: knowing the Vinaya and skilled in the Way,
pli-tv-pvr1.9:5.3: Proclaimed the Vinaya-piṭaka in the Island of Tambapaṇṇi. [1]
pli-tv-pvr1.9:6.1: Where was that offence involving Defeat because of taking what had not been given laid down by that Lord … ?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:6.2: It was laid down in Rājagaha …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:6.11: it may be that he originates it by body and by speech and by mind. [2]
pli-tv-pvr1.9:7.1: Where was that offence involving Defeat because of intentionally depriving a human being of life laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:7.2: It was laid down in Vesālī …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:8.1: Where was that offence involving Defeat because of laying claim (for oneself) to a non-existent, non-actual state of further-men laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:8.2: It was laid down in Vesālī …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:10.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order because of emitting semen making an effort laid down by that Lord … ?  Concerning whom?  On what subject?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:10.2: … By whom has it been conveyed?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:11.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order because of emitting semen making an effort laid down by that Lord … ?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:11.2: It was laid down in Sāvatthī
pli-tv-pvr1.9:11.27: By whom has it been conveyed?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:11.28: It has been conveyed by a succession (of teachers):
pli-tv-pvr1.9:15.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order because of coming into physical contact with a woman laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:15.2: It was laid down in Sāvatthī …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:15.9: he originates it … not by speech. [2]
pli-tv-pvr1.9:16.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order because offending a woman with lewd words laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:16.2: It was laid down in Sāvatthī …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:17.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order because of speaking in praise of ministering to sense-pleasures for (him)self in the presence of a woman laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:17.2: It was laid down in Sāvatthī …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:18.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order because of acting as a go-between laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:18.2: It was laid down in Sāvatthī …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:19.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of Order because of having a hut built begging for it oneself laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:19.2: It was laid down in Āḷavī …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:19.8: He originates it by the six origins. [6]
pli-tv-pvr1.9:20.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order because of having a large vihāra built laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:20.2: It was laid down in Kosambī …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:20.8: He originates it by the six origins. [7]
pli-tv-pvr1.9:21.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order because of defaming a monk with an unfounded charge of an offence involving Defeat laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:21.2: It was laid down in Rājagaha …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:21.8: He originates it by three origins. [8]
pli-tv-pvr1.9:22.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order because of defaming a monk with a charge of an offence involving Defeat taking up some point as a pretext in a legal question really belonging to something else, laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:22.2: It was laid down in Rājagaha …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:22.8: He originates it by three origins. [9]
pli-tv-pvr1.9:23.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order with up to three times admonishing a schismatic monk because of his not giving up (his course) laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:23.2: It was laid down in Rājagaha …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:24.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order with up to three times admonishing monks who were throwing in their lot with a schism because of their not giving up (their course) laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:24.2: It was laid down in Rājagaha …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:25.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order with up to three times admonishing a monk who was difficult to speak to because of his not giving up (his course) laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:25.2: It was laid down in Kosambī …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:26.1: Where was that offence requiring a Formal Meeting of the Order with up to three times admonishing a monk who had bought a family into disrepute because of his not giving up (his course) laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:26.2: It was laid down in Sāvatthī …
pli-tv-pvr1.9:27.1: Where was that offence of Wrong-doing because of, out of disrespect, easing oneself or spitting in water laid down?
pli-tv-pvr1.9:27.2: It was laid down in Sāvatthī.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:27.4: Concerning the group of six monks.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:27.6: On the subject of the group of six monks easing themselves and spitting in water.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:27.7: One laying down, one supplementary laying down.
pli-tv-pvr1.9:27.8: Of the six origins of offences he originates it by one origin:
pli-tv-pvr1.9:27.9: he originates it by body and by mind, not by speech. [75]
pli-tv-pvr1.9:28.1: Concluded is the Chapter on Laying-Down-Where
